EmailTemplate.name: LLP
EmailTemplate.subject: LLP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business services needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist in creating a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) on your behalf.
A Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) is a business entity that is typically formed by licensed professionals depending on the State of formation. An LLP is comprised of at least two partners. Generally, partners in an LLP are not responsible for another partner's debts, obligations, or liabilities. LLPs differ from LPs in that liability protection is granted to all partners.
For your reference, I have provided the fees and links to our Limited Liability Partnership formation services below:
LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP Economy Package | $149.00 + state fee + shipping (20 - 35 business days) Standard Package | $259.00 + state fee + shipping (20 - 35 business days) Express Gold Package | $379.00 + state fee (7 - 10 business days)
OPTIONAL SERVICES Federal Tax Identification Number (FEIN) Application Preparation | $30.00 (Included in Express Gold Package) FEIN Obtainment | $79.00 ($49.00 with Express Gold Package)
Registered Agent Service | $159.00 for the first year
TO GET STARTED: http://www.legalzoom.com/limited-liability-partnerships/limited-liability-partnership-overview.html FOR MORE INFORMATION: http://www.legalzoom.com/llp-guide/llp-defined.html
Please feel free to contact LegalZoom at (888) 381-8758 if you have any further questions. Our Business Formations Team business hours are {!snippetVariable.bizbsi_hours}.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Address} {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
